mapper.select: SELECT report_period FROM ipo_main_income_info WHERE bid = #{id} GROUP BY bid, report_period limit 1

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL/10000,2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'MONETARYFUND' THEN 1 WHEN 'FVALUEFASSET' THEN 2 WHEN 'ACCOUNTREC' THEN 3 WHEN 'OTHERREC' THEN 4 WHEN 'INVENTORY' THEN 5 WHEN 'LTEQUITYINV' THEN 6 WHEN 'FIXEDASSET' THEN 7 WHEN 'CONSTRUCTIONPROGRESS' THEN 8 WHEN 'INTANGIBLEASSET' THEN 9 WHEN 'GOODWILL' THEN 10 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgbalance_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgbalance_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = (select org_code from ipo_case where ID = #{id}) WHERE t1.IS_USE = '1' having sort is not null order by sort

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL/10000,2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'STBORROW' THEN 1 WHEN 'ACCOUNTPAY' THEN 2 WHEN 'TAXPAY' THEN 3 WHEN 'SALARYPAY' THEN 4 WHEN 'LTBORROW' THEN 5 WHEN 'LTSALARYPAY' THEN 6 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgbalance_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgbalance_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = (select org_code from ipo_case where ID = #{id}) WHERE t1.IS_USE = '1' having sort is not null order by sort

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL/10000,2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'SHARECAPITAL' THEN 1 WHEN 'CAPITALRESERVE' THEN 2 WHEN 'RETAINEDEARNING' THEN 3 WHEN 'SUMPARENTEQUITY' THEN 4 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgbalance_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgbalance_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = (select org_code from ipo_case where ID = #{id}) WHERE t1.IS_USE = '1' having sort is not null order by sort

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round( ( CASE WHEN t2.CURR_VAL IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t2.curr_val END ) / 10000, 2 ) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'SUMLASSET' THEN 1 WHEN 'SUMNONLASSET' THEN 2 WHEN 'SUMASSET' THEN 3 WHEN 'SUMLLIAB' THEN 4 WHEN 'SUMNONLLIAB' THEN 5 WHEN 'SUMLIAB' THEN 6 WHEN 'SUMPARENTEQUITY' THEN 7 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgbalance_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgbalance_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = ( SELECT org_code FROM ipo_case WHERE ID = #{id} ) where t1.column_name in ('SUMLASSET','SUMNONLASSET','SUMASSET','SUMLLIAB','SUMNONLLIAB' ,'SUMLIAB','SUMPARENTEQUITY') HAVING sort IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL / 10000, 2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'OPERATEREVE' THEN 8 WHEN 'NETPROFIT' THEN 9 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgincome_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgincome_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = ( SELECT org_code FROM ipo_case WHERE ID = #{id} ) where t1.COLUMN_NAME in ('OPERATEREVE','NETPROFIT') HAVING sort IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL / 10000, 2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'NETOPERATECASHFLOW' THEN 10 WHEN 'NICASHEQUI' THEN 11 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgcashflow_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgcashflow_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = ( SELECT org_code FROM ipo_case WHERE ID = #{id} ) where t1.COLUMN_NAME in ('NETOPERATECASHFLOW','NICASHEQUI') HAVING sort IS NOT NULL order by sort

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL/10000,2) forthYearValue FROM vc_dic_rgincome_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgincome_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = (select org_code from ipo_case where ID = #{id}) WHERE t1.IS_USE = '1' and t1.column_name = 'OPERATEREVE'

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL/10000,2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'OPERATEEXP' THEN 1 WHEN 'OPERATETAX' THEN 2 WHEN 'SALEEXP' THEN 3 WHEN 'MANAGEEXP' THEN 4 WHEN 'RDEXP' THEN 5 WHEN 'FINANCEEXP' THEN 6 WHEN 'ASSETDEVALUELOSS' THEN 7 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgincome_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgincome_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{data} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = (select org_code from ipo_case where ID = #{id}) where t1.COLUMN_NAME in ('OPERATEEXP','OPERATETAX','SALEEXP','MANAGEEXP','RDEXP' ,'FINANCEEXP','ASSETDEVALUELOSS') having sort is not null order by sort

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL/10000,2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'OPERATEPROFIT' THEN 1 WHEN 'SUMPROFIT' THEN 2 WHEN 'NETPROFIT' THEN 3 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgincome_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgincome_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = (select org_code from ipo_case where ID = #{id}) where t1.COLUMN_NAME in ('OPERATEPROFIT','SUMPROFIT','NETPROFIT') having sort is not null

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL / 10000, 2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'LD' THEN 1 WHEN 'SD' THEN 2 WHEN 'ZCFZL' THEN 3 WHEN 'ROEJQ' THEN 4 WHEN 'YSZKZZL' THEN 5 WHEN 'XSQCFZ' THEN 6 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_generalfina_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_generalfina_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = ( SELECT org_code FROM ipo_case WHERE ID = #{id} ) WHERE t1.COLUMN_NAME IN ( 'LD', 'SD', 'ZCFZL', 'ROEJQ', 'YSZKZZL', 'XSQCFZ' ) HAVING sort IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL / 10000, 2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'BASICEPS' THEN 7 WHEN 'CUTBASICEPS' THEN 8 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgincome_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgincome_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = ( SELECT org_code FROM ipo_case WHERE ID = #{id} ) WHERE t1.COLUMN_NAME IN ('BASICEPS', 'CUTBASICEPS') HAVING sort IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sort

SELECT t1.COLUMN_COMMENT itemName, round(t2.CURR_VAL / 10000, 2) forthYearValue, ( CASE t1.column_name WHEN 'INTANGIBLEASSET' THEN 1 WHEN 'SUMSHEQUITY' THEN 2 END ) sort FROM vc_dic_rgbalance_ipo t1 LEFT JOIN vc_fin_report_base_rgbalance_ipo t2 ON t1.ID = t2.MEASURE_ID AND t2.REPORTDATE = #{date} AND T2.COMPANY_ID = ( SELECT org_code FROM ipo_case WHERE ID = #{id} ) WHERE t1.COLUMN_NAME IN ( 'INTANGIBLEASSET', 'SUMSHEQUITY' ) HAVING sort IS NOT NULL
